about_the_game:
The Reaplaced Development Book demystifies the creation of the Halloween-themed murder mystery visual novel, Reaplaced!

The book explains how a team of 9 people, consisting of veterans and beginners alike, successfully worked together to create Reaplaced within 30 days.

Featuring over 70 pages of exclusive developer commentary and dozens of behind the scenes screenshots, you'll learn valuable tips and tricks from the creators of mystery games Detective Butler, Methods, SoulSet, and Game of Fourtune.

A must-have companion book for any fan of Reaplaced, or anyone wanting to learn how mystery games are made!

Chapters and Topics

  • Kinjo Goldbar - Project Management & Background Design
  • ZetaKen - Writing & Scripting
  • Nayru - Character Design & Sprite Art
  • RaVEN - GUI Art
  • Solo - Music Composition
  • LockedOn - Music Composition
  • CyberSe7en - Programming & Scripting
  • Plot:3unny - Proofreading
  • Xolf - Proofreading

Chapter Content

  • Introduction and Role
  • Development Process
  • Problems Encountered
  • Solutions to Problems
  • Lessons Learned
  • And more!

content_descriptors.notes: Some pages of the book may show in-game screenshots depicting strong language, blood, and death. Text commentary on the game's story may refer to legal alcohol consumption, blood, gore, and death.
